summary: A documentary that uses a cache of letters, diaries and documents to reveal the life of SS-leader Heinrich Himmler.
cast: Tobias Moretti|Sophie Rois|Antonia Moretti|Lotte Ledl|Florentin Groll|Pauline Knof|Lenz Moretti|Martin Lalis|Alexander Riemann|Markus Riexinge|Florian Wandel|Thomas Zerck|Rudolf Gorsleben|Hermann Göring|Gudrun Himmler|Heinrich Himmler|Margarethe Himmler|Adolf Hitler|Ernst Röhm
title: Der Anständige
